title: Chicken Enchilada Soup - Crockpot

ingredients.name: Crushed Tortilla Chips or Tortilla Strips

markdown:
Nathan,

On cold days I want something that soothes my soul. This is one of the many crockpot meals that I like to do just that. It has some good flavors and an ode to our Texas roots. No matter where you are in this world I hope that when you need to soothe your soul that these recipes may bring you some peace and good memories. I love you dearly.

Mom

* ½ cup Chopped Onion
* 1 tsp Chili Powder
* 1 tsp Cumin
* 1 tsp Garlic Powder
* 1 19oz can Red Enchilada Sauce
* 1 28oz can Fire-Roasted Diced Tomatoes
* 1 15oz can Black Beans, drained and rinsed
* 2lb Chicken Breasts, cut into thirds
* 2 ½ cup Chicken Broth
* ⅓ cup Cheddar Cheese, shredded
* ¼ cup Heavy Cream
### Toppings

* Sour Cream
* Sliced Lime
* Crushed Tortilla Chips or Tortilla Strips
* Combine all ingredients (exclude Cheese and heavy cream) and place in crockpot on high for 3 ½ hours or on low for 6 hours
* Once done remove and shred chicken and add back to pot adding cheese and heavy cream
* Stir until combined and serve hot with desired toppings
